RAW.SOURCE:
` *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& Report YGPL_MT_RUN_CLEAR *& *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& *& *&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
REPORT YGPL_MT_RUN_CLEAR.
TABLES: ygplmt_runs. TYPE-POOLS: abap.
PARAMETERS: p_simul TYPE abap_bool AS CHECKBOX. SELECT-OPTIONS : s_status FOR ygplmt_runs-status, s_time FOR ygplmt_runs-timestamp.
START-OF-SELECTION. DATA: BEGIN OF t_ids OCCURS 0, run_id TYPE ygplmt_runs-run_id, END OF t_ids. DATA o_run TYPE ygpl_mt_factories=>ti_run. FIELD-SYMBOLS: <id> LIKE LINE OF t_ids.
SELECT r~run_id INTO TABLE t_ids FROM ygplmt_runs AS r WHERE r~status IN s_status AND r~timestamp IN s_time. LOOP AT t_ids ASSIGNING <id>. o_run = ygpl_mt_factories=>get_run( <id>-run_id ). IF p_simul IS INITIAL. o_run->delete( ). ENDIF. WRITE:/ <id>-run_id. COMMIT WORK. ENDLOOP.
END-OF-SELECTION.
